ygData.subject: Re: Paladins
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a paladin in beta myself and recently made level 9, but I notice that spells are pretty worthless, and would be even IF they didnt fizzle 9 times out of
ygData.messageBody:
I play a paladin in beta myself and recently made level 9, but I notice
that spells are pretty worthless, and would be even IF they didnt fizzle 9
times out of 10, minor healing to heal a character with 250 hitpoints
don't do much good, especially when it fizzles so much.. And Cure Poison I
can't even cast at level 9 because I don't have enough mana even at full.
Though my wis is 65(I spent all bonus points on STR and STA;).. Now do
paladins get any better at higher levels? When do paladins get the
"healing" spell for example? And I find it odd that paladins don't seem to
have any bonuses when fighting undead.. I am thinking about switching to
ranger myself hehe..

- Avron -


On Wed, 10 Mar 1999, T.J. - P2 & P5 wrote:

> From: macainsht@... (T.J. - P2 & P5)
>
> well, if you need any help about spells, and what they can do.. goto
> www.everworld.net (I am a staff member =) and that should help you out,
> but basically the paladin isn't as strong melee but it does help itself
> out by knowing magic at high levels of its class (level 9 they can learn
> magic) just to let you know, I think Rangers are the best class around
> =) hehe
>
> Trilin
> Newsreporter, inside and outside of everquest
